snippet: "James has an ear for sweet melodies that build worlds out of everyday minutiae, with dark undertones at times." - Peter Diamond, City Pages

title: Night Blindness - Album Review
snippet: A clever and dark Gen Z Ode. Bathtub cig's debut full length "Night Blindness" showcases intimate depression pop at its finest.

title: bed EP Review
snippet: Dream-like and hazy musing on quarantine and heartbreaking grief. Solo work featuring Addie Strei (Adelyn Rose) on clarinet, flute, and bass.

title: Old Light EP Review
snippet: Synth-pop debut EP compared to Frankie Cosmo with raw, honest lyrics dealing with mental health struggles.
